    • onActionChangeMonth

      void onActionChangeMonth(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)

      Parameters:

      Parameters:

    • showTotal

      void showTotal(Month month, String type)
      Calculates total and displays it inside the total text box. This utilizes a data stream to filter out the list of all appointments to only those which match the criteria set by the user; namely by month and appointment type. We must use a lambda to set the conditions for which each appointment item will be filtered out or included in the filtered list. We then convert back to ta collection so that we may easily count the total filtered items by using size() method.
      Parameters:
      month - month total filter
      type - type total filter
